short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover immersive web stories related to the current web page you are visiting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Stories are a visually rich, full-screen content format for the web, which allow you to tap or swipe through articles. To consume content, you can tap or swipe through them.

● Instant access to the available storified articles
● No spam
● Share easily with friends an family


LATEST UPDATES
● New layout, representing better the web stories format
● When visiting a website, we the extension icon shows a bage with te # of stories available (no popups)
● Link to Creators/Brands Profile
● Stories show the topic/category


QUESTION?
Need help? Head to https://webstories.today/contact


PRIVACY
We don't track which websites your visit.  This browser extension works perfectly anonymous.
